name: What the gun?
description:
Have you ever wondered how a gun feels under stress? Well, we have. Because we care. 

Introducing What The Gun? - The innovative non-simulator about a gun and its battle for survival against gravity.

Hit as many targets as you can to bring home an incredible score, but be careful not to hit the astronauts, they are friends... for now... 

CONTROLS (Keyboard)

ROTATE - Left & Right arrow key
SHOOT - Spacebar

Made for the Kenney Jam 2021 by:
Jami Salati - Designer
Antonio Stissi - Developer
